3: For our final session, Commandant, we will be doing field testing today.
Although it's called field testing, we'll only be tackling a mission that seems doable by myself.

4: Can you handle them all on your own?

3: I'll be fine. I've already done my pre-battle preparations.

2: Isn't it the one that got away last time?

3: The Corrupted who escaped because of my mistake... Good... Let me show you what I've learnt!

2: Wait, Liv! Let's contact Lucia and Lee first!

3: That's not necessary... I've completed my calculation on this Corrupted as well!
That's not necessary... You just have to observe like before, Commandant.
It's spinning...?! That's not a move in my calculation!
Levi-Gun ready! Minimum firing distance reached! Fire!
But I still had to rely on you in the end, Commandant...
If I want to contribute instead of dragging you behind, I'll have to accomplish something on my own without you...

2: But if you could do that, you wouldn't need me anymore.
4: I would love to have you rely on me.

3: Ah... I didn't say I don't need you... Hmm.
Commandant, you always undermine my goal like this!

Will you please watch over me, Commandant?
